journals.notes:
IR4T4 wrote:
> Any steps to reproduce?

These are old bugs, essentially when you are reloading if you spam the weapon change (from mp40 -> healthpack) it wil change to the healthpack after the animation is finished but when you swtich back to the gun it has not really reloaded.

When you reload a weapon you cant stop the process and switch to a pistol or any other weapon. (This should be in the game imho!)

The zoom thing should not be implemented, when zooming the sniper needs to close his scope.. This is how it is in every game and imho for a good reason, without this the sniper would be a bit OP.

The same issue as with reload switching exists with the pickup, theres a delay when you cant actually use the weapon (not long but still exists and annoying)

I came to noticed that you can't pick up any other weapons except Sten while reloading. When you have Sten you are able to pick up another weapon. Also what I noticed that now it's fixed that you can't reload while pressing +zoom (B) but you can zoom while reloading.

-*S
